name: KUROSHIRO No. 2
description:
Sighting number 2

"Wyvern"

Sat. Feb 5, 2022, 16:43
It was a sunny Saturday afternoon. I went outside to get some fresh air amidst this never-ending pandemic. I took some pictures of sunsets and when I looked up, I saw a red dragon nesting right above the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church. This is the legendary dragon, WYVERN (Waibān). It was just taking a rest right above the church and taking a relieving breath as it sees humanity from a different perspective. I guess it was just feeling lucky, that dragons don’t have to feel or experience what we (as humans) are facing right now, either COVID or war. Surely. I do believe that someday we are able to conquer these problems. Stay healthy to all of you people out there, and love each other :)

---------------------------
KURO means black in Japanese and SHIRO means white.

KUROSHIRO is a series of black and white pictures with a doodle of sightings all around Germany. These pictures were all taken by a Google Pixel 5.

2268 x 2268
